SELECT cs.SHORT_NAME AS SUPPLIER_NAME, ue.SOURCE AS SOURCE, upe.`NAME` PRODUCT_NAME, ui.ITEM_STATUS AS ITEM_STATUS , cmy.EN_NAME AS COMPANY_NAME , cc.SHORT_NAME AS CUSTOMER_NAME , mt.`NAME` AS DEPT_NAME, ue.CREATE_TIME AS CREATE_TIME, ue.SALE_ORDER_NO AS SALE_ORDER_NO, ue.PLAN_AMOUNT AS SALE_PLAN_AMOUNT, ue.ACTUAL_AMOUNT AS SALE_ACTUAL_AMOUNT, ub.PLAN_AMOUNT AS BUY_PLAN_AMOUNT , ui.ADDITIONAL_INFO AS ADDITIONAL_INFO
FROM UNP_BUY ub LEFT JOIN CPS_SUPPLIER cs ON ub.SUPPLIER_ID = cs.SUPPLIER_NO LEFT JOIN UNP_SALE ue ON ue.SALE_ORDER_NO = ub.SALE_ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN UNP_SALE_ITEM ui ON ue.SALE_ORDER_NO = ui.SALE_ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN UNP_ITEM_TYPE upe ON upe.ITEM_TYPE_NO = ui.UNP_TYPE LEFT JOIN CPS_CUSTOMER cc ON cc.CUSTOMER_NO = ue.CUSTOMER_NO LEFT JOIN SM_USER sr ON sr.LOGIN_NAME = ue.CREATOR LEFT JOIN SM_DEPT mt ON mt.ID = sr.DEPT_ID LEFT JOIN CPS_SIGN_COMPANY cmy ON cc.SIGN_CORPORATION = cmy.`CODE` WHERE ui.VALID = '1'
AND IL.DEP_TIME >=DATE_FORMAT(#{ticketDateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND IL.DEP_TIME <=DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(#{ticketDateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')+1, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND upe.ITEM_TYPE_NO =#{itemTypeNo}
AND ue.CHANGE_TYPE=#{changeType}'
ORDER BY ue.SALE_ORDER_NO
